tool_description: 👍 The best  taobao api in rapidapi.com. There are product item api and category api.
name: taobao-api
title: taobao-api

api_list.name: Item sku information
api_list.description: Grabbing sku related information from a taobao item.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://taobao-api2.p.rapidapi.com/taobao/v1/item/712424796414/sku"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "taobao-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://taobao-api2.p.rapidapi.com/taobao/v1/item/{id}/sku"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "taobao-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
